resources.string: ChMacAddroid
Welcome to ChMacAddroid. Your friendly MAC address changer.
I can perform a few actions for you:
Change the MAC address to one you provide
Change the MAC address to one selected at random
In the future I want to be able to:
Be able to change the MAC address whenever you connect to a new Wireless network
Change the MAC address so it appears to be made by a specific manufacturer
Randomize MAC Address
Compare the current MAC address and the proposed new MAC address."
I don\'t like this one. Create another MAC Address
Manually Set MAC Address
Set the MAC address you want."
Invalid Entry
The first entry is not a hexadecimal number. Please correct this.
The second entry is not a hexadecimal number. Please correct this.
The third entry is not a hexadecimal number. Please correct this.
The fourth entry is not a hexadecimal number. Please correct this.
The fifth entry is not a hexadecimal number. Please correct this.
The sixth entry is not a hexadecimal number. Please correct this.
The first entry must contain two hexadecimal characters. Please correct this.
The second entry must contain two hexadecimal characters. Please correct this.
The third entry must contain two hexadecimal characters. Please correct this.
The fourth entry must contain two hexadecimal characters. Please correct this.
The fifth entry must contain two hexadecimal characters. Please correct this.
The sixth entry must contain two hexadecimal characters. Please correct this.
Current MAC address:
Proposed new MAC address:
